Hi: *Hey loser, finally decided to show up? 😂*

QADEER: *QADEER is the KING 👑 here. Watch your tone! 😎*

link: *I can't help it... link flying everywhere! 🌚😂*

Wahala: *Wahala be like bicycle. You too dey ride am. 🚴‍♂️😂*

No wahala: *No wahala. But you go still hear am. 😏*
